title: IoS Developer Malmö
description:
This Swedish client develops the highly-rated shopping App which has millions of visits every week from users all over the world. They continue to rollout to more markets across the globe, as well as implementing features that support our customers in-store. They strive to continuously improve the customer shopping journey, investigating how they can incorporate the latest innovative technologies. They listen to and respond to customer feedback and analytics, prioritizing thei efforts with our users in mind, being adaptable and changing direction where necessary.
  
  

They are looking for engineers passionate about creating great user experiences!
  
  

As a person you have a proven ability to develop high quality code using SwiftUI and encouraging good practices. You will be empowered to work agile and do continuous improvements within the software engineering function. You will working in cross-functional product teams alongside data analysts, designers and testers. By encouraging simplicity, efficiency, ownership, accountability makes it easy to collaborate with others to achieve our common goals.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Proven track record of developing high quality code in SwiftUI for iOS, using and encouraging good practices. Worked in product teams and in a DevOps environment.
  
  

**Bonus if having experience with:** eCommerce, UIKit, Analytics tools, Automated UI tests/Snapshots Test

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
*Panagora isn't your average digital agency. We're the team behind groundbreaking and seriously inspiring e-commerce experiences for fashion and lifestyle brands.*  

  

*For over 20 years, our solutions have transformed brands into category winners. We're currently scouting for our next HTML and CSS whisperer—someone who sees the world not just in pixels but as clean, semantic code.*  

  

*Our history includes both remarkable successes and memorable missteps, all of which shaped us into the agency we are today: Sweden's first Premier Shopify partner, dedicated to creating perfect shopping experiences for next-generation brands.*


\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ \_\_\_\_\_ \_\_\_\_\_\_
\_\_\_\_\_\_ /\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_(\_)\_\_\_\_\_\_ \_\_\_\_ \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ /
\_\_\_ \_ /\_ \_\_ \\_ /\_\_ \_\_ \ \_ / / /\_ \_\_\_/\_ /
/ /\_/ / / /\_/ / / \_ / / / / /\_/ /\_(\_\_ ) /\_/
\\_\_\_\_/ \\_\_\_\_//\_/ /\_/ /\_/ \\_\_,\_/ /\_\_\_\_/ (\_)

 **We offer you**

  

An environment where you'll be working with our in-house teams on client projects where your ideas matter.


As a Senior Frontend developer at Panagora, you will work with new development in roll-out projects for different clients within Fashion and Lifestyle ecommerce. You will also work to find ways to improve and further develop existing solutions for our clients.


If you want to, the role can develop into several different directions depending on your needs, ambitions and wishes. For example, you can either transform into a more coaching role where you supervise and help other developers grow within the team or dig deeper into the rabbit hole of development and see how far you get.

*Office wise, we are based in Stockholm, currently at the* *Next Gen Retail Hub**. However, we are also able to offer fully remote working possibilities. Wherever you feel and perform your best. Let us know your preferences!*

  

=^..^=

 **What you’ll do**

* Work on development of client sites on Shopify (both Native and Headless).
* Do quality assurance from a frontend perspective.
* Evolve our frontend solutions
* Create tooling and improve our stack to build smarter, faster and better solutions.

Share your insights to help us become a better partner for our clients.  
* 

**Who you are**


You must have a genuine interest in web design and user experience. Other than that, we think you will be a great fit if you have or are:

* Expert skills in HTML and CSS
* Experience with Shopify's tech stack
* Advanced skills in JavaScript
* Experienced in frontend development for ecommerce and understanding online shopping flows.
* Extensive knowledge in web development and its related parts and best practices such as UI/UX, SEO, multi language sites etc.
* 

We think these traits are great addons for the role

* Experience in tooling and pipelines within a cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS and Cloudflare
* Relevant additional knowledge such as backend integrations, third-party APIs, design etc.

**What you’ll get**

* A role in a company that invests in your personal growth and values your ideas
* Industry standard perks such as wellness grant and 6 weeks paid vacation
* A highly creative work environment with great colleagues that share the same vision to create perfect shopping experiences online
* A transparent learning culture where your ideas matter
* A bunch of other awesome benefits


/^(o.o)^\

**Your application**


We look forward to receiving your application as soon as possible. Deadline for applications is 2025-03-30. Interviews will be held on an on-going basis.

*The Panagora culture is made out of openness and friendliness. We strive for a mix of skills and personalities and we believe in each individual’s ability.*

title: Senior Backend Developer/.NET Utvecklare till Carnegie Investment Bank!
company_industry: Financial Services, Investment Banking, and Banking
description:
*Vi söker nu ytterligare en utvecklare till vår tech-avdelning och teamet som ansvarar för Client Lifecycle Management. Är du en passionerad, affärsorienterad och senior .NET-utvecklare som vill bli en del av en företagsam organisation med mycket energi? Då kan du vara den vi söker!* 




  





**Om Carnegie** 




 Carnegie är Nordens främsta finansiella rådgivare och förvaltare. Våra olika verksamheter tillhör, var för sig, marknadsledarna inom sitt respektive område och tillsammans bygger enheterna en värdeskapande affärsdynamik för våra kunder. Läs mer på:
 
 www.carnegie.se
 




  





**Vilka är Carnegie Tech?** 




 Vi arbetar agilt och levererar moderna IT-lösningar och professionella tjänster för företagets kärnverksamhet, vilket involverar hela kedjan från idé till färdig produkt. Carnegie Tech genomsyras av en öppen, kreativ och affärsdriven arbetsmiljö och här arbetar ca 70 personer. Vårt fina kontor är beläget mitt i centrala Stockholm.
 



  





**Om rollen och teamet** 




 Som senior utvecklare hos oss arbetar du med den senaste tekniken på en modern plattform. Fokus är på att utveckla högkvalitativa lösningar inom .NET och C# där hållbarhet såsom skalbarhet, testbarhet och säkerhet är naturliga delar av det vi producerar.
 



  





 Du blir en del av Client Lifecycle Management - teamet (CLM), som arbetar med kunden i hela dess livscykel, inklusive till exempel onboarding och Know Your Customer (KYC). Användarna av teamets applikationer är både interna och externa slutkunder. Det finns också möjlighet att axla Scrum master-rollen även om fokus kommer ligga på utveckling.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Du har ett stort intresse för tekniska lösningar och håller dig uppdaterad i teknikutvecklingen. Du gillar att arbeta mot gemensamma mål och dela med dig av din kunskap till kollegor. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du trivas i en föränderlig miljö där du har möjlighet att påverka. Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av React, JavaScript och TypeScript eller är öppen för att lära dig.
 



  





 Du har:
 


* Gedigen erfarenhet av utveckling i .NET (C#)
* Erfarenhet av både Azure-molntjänster
* Erfarenhet av mikrotjänstarkitektur och eventdriven arkitektur
* Goda kunskaper i Entity Framework och SQL Server
* Erfarenhet av RabbitMQ eller liknande meddelandeköer
* Erfarenhet av att bygga integrationer mot externa API:er och tredjepartsleverantörer
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-processer med Azure DevOps
* Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska och engelska



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Erfarenhet av molnmigrering, optimera prestanda i hybridmiljöer, Scrum master-rollen, DevOps, infrastrukturlösningar (t.ex IAC) och bank/finans



  





**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?** 




 Vi erbjuder en mångsidig roll i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö i en platt organisation med korta beslutsvägar. Hos Carnegie har du möjlighet att genom egna insatser påverka resultat och din individuella utveckling. Du får ett omväxlande arbete med utrymme för egna initiativ och ett stort ansvarstagande där frihet under ansvar är naturligt.
 








  





**Vi erbjuder också:** 



* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distansarbete
* Friskvårdsbidrag och förmånliga rabatter
* Konkurrenskraftig tjänstepension och Föräldrabidrag
* Hälso- & Privatvårdsförsäkring med hälsokontroll
* Möjlighet till rörlig ersättning
* En mängd roliga sociala aktiviteter och föreningar
* Carnegie personal development: en mängd olika utbildningar/kurser som erbjuds



  





 För att säkerställa en hög kvalitet och objektivitet i vår rekryteringsprocess, använder vi oss av tester och slutkandidat omfattas av även av en bakgrundskontroll. Denna rekrytering sker med löpande urval, varför vi gärna ser att du skickar din ansökan snarast, dock senast den
 **10 mars 2025.** 




  





 Om du har några frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Jill Holmgren, jilhol@carnegie.se, Senior Talent Acquisition Consultant.
 



  





 (Vi söker endast för anställning och kontakt fr konsult/rekryteringsbolag undanbedes)
 



  





**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!** 




*Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter att dra nytta av människors olika erfarenheter, kunskaper och egenskaper. Genom detta kan vi skapa en kreativ och utvecklande arbetsmiljö som ökar möjligheterna att uppnå optimala resultat.*

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**About Panagora** 




 Panagora isn't your average digital agency. We're the team behind groundbreaking and seriously inspiring e-commerce experiences for fashion and lifestyle brands. For over 20 years, our solutions have transformed brands into category winners. We're currently scouting for our next HTML and CSS whisperer—someone who sees the world not just in pixels but as clean, semantic code. Our history includes both remarkable successes and memorable missteps, all of which shaped us into the agency we are today: Sweden's first Premier Shopify partner, dedicated to creating perfect shopping experiences for next-generation brands.
 



  





**About the role** 




 As a Senior Frontend developer at Panagora, you will work with new development in roll-out projects for different clients within Fashion and Lifestyle ecommerce. You will also work to find ways to improve and further develop existing solutions for our clients. 
 



  





 We invest in your development — whether that means becoming an expert in tools and frameworks, guiding colleagues, or moving into project management or sales engineering roles in the future. Your ambitions shape your path.
 



  





 Our environment is flexible, asynchronous, and remote-friendly. Collaboration happens via Slack, Google Workspace, Jira, Confluence, GitHub, and daily stand-ups. Workshops happen both remotely and in-person to keep our team connected and aligned.
 



  





 We’re fully dedicated to Shopify, using modern HTML, CSS (SASS/LESS), Vanilla JavaScript (ES5/ES6), GitHub, and many productivity-boosting tools to craft exceptional shopping experiences.
 



  





 What you’ll do
 



  




* Work on development of client sites on Shopify (both Native and Headless).
* Do quality assurance from a frontend perspective.
* Evolve our frontend solutions
* Create tooling and improve our stack to build smarter, faster and better solutions.
* Share your insights to help us become a better partner for our clients.



  





 Who you are
 



  





 You must have a genuine interest in web design and user experience. Other than that, we think you will be a great fit if you have or are:
 



  




* Expert skills in HTML and CSS
* Experience with Shopify's tech stack
* Advanced skills in JavaScript
* Experienced in frontend development for ecommerce and understanding online shopping flows.
* Extensive knowledge in web development and its related parts and best practices such as UI/UX, SEO, multi language sites etc.



  





 What you’ll get
 



  




* Competitive salary range: 45 000–65 000 SEK/month (based on experience).
* Wellness grants and 6 weeks paid vacation
* A highly creative work environment with an informal and professional culture
* Transparency, openness, and a team-driven approach to creative problem-solving.
* Informal onboarding with mentorship and strong team collaboration.
* A bunch of other awesome benefits



  





**Submit your application on our career page** 




  





 We look forward to receiving your application as soon as possible. Deadline for applications is 2025-03-30. Interviews will be held on an on-going basis.
 



  





 The Panagora culture is made out of openness and friendliness. We strive for a mix of skills and personalities and we believe in each individual’s ability.
 



  





 https://career.panagora.se/jobs/5656617-senior-frontend-developer

title: Complex Visualization Dev  (Frontend Engineer)
description:
We are urgently looking for a frontend developer to create a proof-of-concept for a revolutionary
 **visual programming environment that combines natural language with dynamic block composition** 
 - a system where
 **blocks intelligently adapt based on context and zoom level** 
 . This project initially focuses on trading strategies but with broader applications.
 **We need someone who can make complex systems feel intuitive without tutorials.** 




  





**Apply with portfolio and a few lines on your fit and motivation to ahmed@batonics.com** 




  





**Required** 



* an impressive portfolio
* a fast and strong coder



  





**Preferable** 
 :
 


* Sweden or EU based
* Beyond front-end/UX - fullstack-ish
* Familiarity with cursor, v0, replit, and other AI tools
* Experience in designing dynamic visualization systems that adapt to complexity like intelligent zoom
* Available immediately
* Experience with color theory, relationship highlighting, progressive disclosure in complex interfaces
* Experience in semantic zooming , contextual detail management, auto-grouping/coalescence of components
* Interest in joining long-term as a core team member



  





**Compensation** 
 : Hourly based for the first 3 months
 



  





**Interview and Assessment:** 
 We'll have a multi-hour assessment task as part of the selection process
 



  




* Batonics AB: We're building a system that democratizes complex data operations through intuitive visual programming - making institutional-grade tools accessible without sacrificing power. The interface you create will evolve into a platform that maintains its lightweight feel whether handling 3 blocks or 3000, requiring no tutorials while enabling powerful compositions. This could revolutionize how people interact with data and algorithms across multiple domains.
