This includes Monitoring trends & insights, Lead new product development (NPD), Building marketing campaigns (both digital and catalogue) and Manage data driven business initiatives. The Global skincare team is part of the Global Marketing department.

title: Product Owner
description:
**Role:**

  

* Deliver recommendations that help customers find what they need on our digital platforms.
* Define the product vision and strategy while building strong relationships with stakeholders.
* Understand our customers' needs and make data-driven decisions.
* Work with your product team to execute and deliver a clear roadmap.


We are looking for someone with a solid understanding of business strategy and experience working in Agile or DevOps environments. You have strong analytical skills to make well-founded, data-driven decisions. Additionally, you are an excellent communicator who can engage with both business and technical stakeholders in an international environment.

**Essential requirements:**

* Excellent skills in leading a team with multiple technical disciplines.
* Strong focus on customer problems and needs, with a natural curiosity for solving them.
* Good knowledge of e-commerce, preferably with experience in recommendation systems.
* Ability to influence, listen to, and collaborate successfully with various stakeholders in a complex environment.
* Confident in the product owner role in relation to other digital functions, and best practices in building agile, outcome-oriented ways of working.
* End-to-end ownership of backend products and applications, preferably with an understanding of data science.
* Strong ability to identify with the customers and inspire deep customer empathy within the team.
* Good knowledge of defining and measuring success, such as creating OKRs.
* Passionate about the digital future and navigating in complex environments.
* Data-informed and outcome-driven mindset.

 **Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 100**%**  

**Location:** Malmö  

**Period**: 01-04-2025-31-08-2025  

**Last day to apply**: 13-03-2025  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: Software Architect within Azure
description:
**Varför vill du ha det här jobbet?**
 För att du älskar att skapa system som är effektiva, kostnadseffektiva och använder en modern teknikstack. Du ser dig själv som en väsentlig del av teamet där din och teamets vision blir verklighet i molnet. Du vill göra skillnad genom att bidra med perspektiv, färdigheter och erfarenhet till olika branscher och miljöer.
   

  

**Bygg en karriär du kan vara stolt över**
 Som en del av vårt team kan din resa ta olika vägar när du utvecklar system tillsammans med våra kunder. Ibland arbetar du direkt hos kunden, men oftast sker arbetet internt – alltid med målet att leverera resultat av hög kvalitet. Du kan till exempel skapa en IoT-plattform, utveckla en applikation för sensorhantering inom MedTech, eller bygga en dataplattform för industriell produktion. Exakt vilket projekt du kommer att arbeta med vet vi först när du har blivit en del av Knightec, och det är just den variationen och möjligheten att själv välja projekt som gör arbetet här så spännande!
   

  

**Som Arkitekt i Vårt Team Kommer Du Att**
* Hjälpa våra kunder redan i ett tidigt skede genom att designa lösningsarkitekturer för Azure-baserade system.
* Driva kunden i rätt riktning och bidra till att öka deras kompetens inom molntjänster.
* Arbeta både med lösningsarkitektur och hands-on implementering – du jobbar gärna i gränslandet mellan arkitektur och teknik.
* Stötta och vägleda våra kunder i strategiska frågor gällande arkitektur, kostnadsoptimering och innovation.


**Kvalifikationer**
* Flera års erfarenhet som mjukvaruutvecklare med en examen från teknisk högskola eller universitet.
* Expertis inom att skapa system från idé till färdig produkt, specifikt inom Azure.
* Förmåga att tänka på kostnader och fördelar tillsammans med hållbarheten för systemet eller produkten.
* Starka kommunikationsfärdigheter både internt och externt gällande krav, behov och tekniska val.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.


**Vad vi erbjuder**
 På Knightec får du arbeta i en innovativ och stödjande miljö med projekt som gör skillnad. Vi värderar mångfald och samarbete och tror på att utveckla både produkter och människor. Med över 40 olika nationaliteter och en hybrid arbetsmodell som främjar flexibilitet, erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsplats med balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Här får du möjligheten att växa både personligen och professionellt, med stöd från vårt team och genom spännande projekt för ledande företag.
   

  

**En spännande resa med Knightec Group**
 Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar
 **Knightec Group** 
 . Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar. Låter detta som platsen för dig? Häng med oss på denna spännande resa!

title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About The Role**
*Are you a seasoned penetration tester? Do you want to work in an international environment with some of the best cybersecurity professionals in the industry? We are looking for you to be a part of us!*
 We are looking for a Senior Penetration Tester to join the Technical Assessments service unit at DNV Cyber in Stockholm. You will be joining a team of security specialists advising DNV Cyber clients as they rely on us to find vulnerabilities in their networks, systems and applications.
   

  

 As a Senior Penetration Tester, you will play a crucial role in advising our clients as they rely on us to find vulnerabilities in their network setups, web and mobile applications, physical devices or cloud deployments. In addition, you will have an opportunity to work with some very security-minded colleagues and clients.
   

  

**Most of your daily work will revolve around security assessments where the following tasks are expected:**
* Identify vulnerabilities in applications, systems and networks.
* Document the vulnerabilities by describing them, providing reproduction and remediation steps and classifying their severity according to industry standards.
* Ensure project deadlines are met, and clients are kept up to date on meeting project milestones.
* Interact with customers in a collaborative, consultative manner to deliver world-class results.


 What we offer
   

  

**Be one of us**
 We have recently embarked on an exciting journey – formerly known as Nixu, now combined forces with DNV and Applied Risk, with the goal of creating a leading European cyber security services business.
   

  

 At DNV Cyber, we are passionate about cybersecurity and take pride in the way we are impacting the society we live in. We encourage you to excel professionally through knowledge sharing and demanding cases. At DNV Cyber, you'll have 500 colleagues who share an interest in cyber security with you.
   

  

 At DNV Cyber, you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of cases and customers from various industries. You will be working in an international environment with global opportunities to advance in your career. With us, you will be surrounded by the most talented people in the cyber security field. We encourage you to keep challenging yourself by exploring new areas of expertise.
   

  

 Join us on an exciting adventure of growth, meaningful work, and shaping the future through cyber security!
   

  

 DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.
   

  

**About You**
**You have the following**
* Proven experience as a penetration tester, with hands-on experience in ethical hacking.
* Deep understanding of cybersecurity and strong technical skills.
* Strong understanding of web application security, network security, and operating system security.
* Ability to identify vulnerabilities in both Windows and Linux systems.
* Experience with different hacking tools.
* Excellent communication and reporting skills in both Swedish and English.


**Excellent consultant skills are essential for long term success; these soft skills will make you successful in this role:**
* Communication skills; able to adapt the message to different situations and audiences.
* Listening skills; understand the customers and be able to empathize with them.
* Relaxed attitude; able to adapt to moving requirements and ways of working.
* Constant learning attitude; not afraid to take on new challenges.


 As a Senior Penetration Tester, you actively want to stay up to date with the latest technologies. To succeed in this role, we believe you are a specialist in a particular area or technology, driven by the ambition to create a meaningful impact.

title: Field Service Engineer
description:
Schneider Electric's Industrial Automation department meets a strong demand from our customers and need more talented engineers to join our team. We are looking for you who are a key member of staff within the company Field Services delivery and Support departments where the main responsibility of this engineering role is to undertake site, planned maintenance, breakdown fault find & troubleshooting, and other activities across a range of electronic hardware/software based control and safety systems.
  
  

You are part of our delivery organization together with colleagues in Sweden but also with colleagues from across both the Nordics and the UK. The role requires travel, especially within Sweden but also within the whole zone of Nordic and Baltic. Hence a EU or UK passport is required.
  
  

**Your primary responsibilities:**  

* Responsible for project delivery and field activities ensuring complex installation, maintenance and repair on customer installed base. Dedicated for field activities on customer installed base and project delivery.
* Execution of technical tasks following notification, dedicated to asset management offer and project and engineering.
* Identify new opportunities while attending customer sites to promote Services growth.
* Field Service Engineering work focused on providing technical advice to customers including commissioning, installing, and testing of products/equipment.


What will you do?
  
* Provide site-based maintenance, repair, modification (wiring and fitting/assembly), testing and commissioning, on-shore and off-shore.
* Provide sound engineering advice as required across a spectrum of engineering problems.
* Assistance to sales in technical queries, proposals and cost estimating as required.
* Assist in new systems build (design/testing) where required.
* Organization of site visit dates and all logistics for site visits.
* Maintain site modification files to a high standard.


Your skills and experience
  
  

* A sound practical understanding of basic electrical and electronic circuits. Be able to follow a system circuit design drawing and then be able to modify system circuitry and connections
* At least some demonstrable site-based experience in electronic/electrical/software (SCADA, PLC or DCS) control and/or safety systems maintenance, fault finding, repair, modification (including wiring and fitting/assembly), testing and commissioning.
* Testing at system level
* Undertaking engineering design changes to existing systems
* Proven hardware and software capabilities.


To be successful in the role, you are methodical, have good interpersonal skills and possess strong problem-solving capabilities. You are self-motivated, self-reliant, and able to work under pressure with the ability to work as part of a team. Possess the necessary communication skills to get results. A good command of English is essential. You share Schneider Electric's core values - Customer first, Learn every day, Embrace different, Act like owners, Dare to disrupt.
  
  

What do we offer you?
  
  

This is a great opportunity to join Schneider Electric and power your career! You will be joining an international, dynamic, and responsible company, with an enviable reputation in the market with a strong focus on individual growth, education, and several interesting development opportunities.
  
  

...

title: Coding Trainer
description:
Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
   

  

 We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
   

  

**You must write Swedish for this specific AI training opportunity**
**About The Opportunity**
* Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
* This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you


**You may contribute your expertise by…**
* Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
* Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models


**Examples Of Desirable Expertise**
* Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in Swedish (required)
* Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institution
* Proficiency working with one or more of the the following languages: Java, Python, JavaScript / TypeScript, C++, Swift, and Verilog
* Excellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines


**Payment**
* Currently, pay rates for core project work by coding experts range from USD $25 to $50 per hour.
* Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.


*PLEASE NOTE: We collect, retain and use personal data for our professional business purposes, including notifying you of opportunities that may be of interest and sharing with our affiliates. We limit the personal data we collect to that which we believe is appropriate and necessary to manage applicants’ needs, provide our services, and comply with applicable laws. Any information we collect in connection with your application will be treated in accordance with the* 
*Outlier Privacy Policy* 
*and our internal policies and programs designed to protect personal data.*
*This is a 1099 contract opportunity on the* 
*Outlier.ai* 
*platform. Because this is a freelance opportunity, we do not offer internships, sponsorship, or employment. You must be authorized to work in your country of residence. If you are an international student, you may be able to sign up for Outlier if you are on a visa. You should contact your tax and/or immigration advisor with specific questions regarding your circumstances.*
